descriptions.yaml_template: is a path to values YAML template file from CSAR (mandatory)
descriptions.mrcf_json: is a path to MRCF JSON file from CPI or from Git (optional)
descriptions.helm_charts: is a path to HELM Charts folder, eg. relative path to helm subfolder (optional)
descriptions.system_size: is a name of the flavor/profile/system size and can be: small-system, standard-system, large-system (optional)
descriptions.config_yaml: is a path to config.yaml file containing configuration like priorities from where to take values to set up (optional)
